revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Libre Computer |model=ROC-RK3328-CC |revision=Renegade (1GB) |asin=B078RMQYHS |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Firefly |manuf_model=ROC-RK3328-CC |price=35 |est_release_date=01/2018 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3328 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A4G165WE-BCRC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eMMC module connector, |expansion_usb_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-VRMS Audio Line Driver;TI;DRV632;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 4 Line Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;5;,,, 2 Line Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5302F;;1; |flags=HDMI 2.0a, MicroSD Card slot, CVBS header, ADC header, IR receiver, GPIO, SPI, I2C, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018-09; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.179;Ubuntu 18.04; |tp_firmware=Armbian, Android 7.1, |oui_eth=56:F0:40 }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://libre.computer/products/boards/roc-rk3328-cc/ Product page]:[https://roc-rk3328-cc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html Docs] ''"Firefly www.t-firefly.com, www.libre.computer
Libre Computer Board ROC-RK3328-CC-V1.0-A"''
is silkscreened on the board near the HDMI output. {{see also|Rockchip|List of Single-board computers}} *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#ROC-RK3328-CC_(Renegade) ''Libre Computer ROC-RK3328-CC (Renegade)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/renegade-arm-computer-with-usb-3-on-android-linux ''Renegade ARM Computer with USB 3.0 on Android Linux'' on '''Indiegogo'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/12/05/libre-computer-renegade-sbc-features-rockchip-rk3328-processor-with-up-to-4gb-ddr4-ram-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer Renegade SBC Features Rockchip RK3328'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=libre-computer-renegade ''ROC-RK3328-CC: A Raspberry Pi competitor with Gigabit Ethernet'' on '''Phoronix''' ] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz :64-bit ARMv8 CPU with NEON and Crypto Extensions *GPU: ''Mali-450MP2'' @500MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 1GB (DDR4-2133) SDRAM on 32-bit bus *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, :eMMC module socket *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ===See also=== *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] *[[Libre Computer Tritium]] __NOTOC__
